analysis.summary: The field 'recipient_address' is a standard address input field requiring complete mailing/shipping address information for a recipient.
insights: Field type: address - requires structured address components
Context suggests this is for delivery or shipping purposes
Should accommodate both domestic and international address formats
Critical field for form completion and order fulfillment
recommendations: Implement multi-line address input with fields for: street address (line 1), apartment/suite (line 2), city, state/province, postal/zip code, and country
Add real-time address validation using postal service APIs
Include autocomplete functionality for faster data entry
Make all address components required except apartment/suite line
Validate postal/zip code format based on selected country
Consider implementing address standardization for consistency
